problem.p: What has been the most challenging aspect in the second half of the course?

choicegroup.submitted_message: Thank you for submitting your response.

choice.name: system
choice.text: Using the system (entering equations, working with due dates, or other technical issues)

problem.p: If you chose "other", please let us know what has been the most challenging part of the course so far.

stringresponse.answer: It's a survey. There is no right answer!
